name: It Adds Up Over Time
description:
This game is a basic survival game... With a twist!

Every 10 seconds, a series of events happen. They can be good or bad for you.

Every 30 seconds, a new event is added to that list.

As you probably can guess, It Adds Up Over Time.

FULL SCREEN OR YOU WON'T BE ABLE TO SEE THE FULL GAME
